function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Threat to public health and economy due to COVID-19","Impact":"Endangerment of public health, economy, and the fabric of society","Mitigation":"Implementation of rigorous health and safety measures, vaccination campaigns, and economic support programs","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, vaccine development and distribution technology","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in urban areas","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased monitoring and management of human activities by corporate capitalism","Impact":"Potential erosion of privacy and autonomy, exploitation of personal data","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict data protection regulations, transparency in data collection and usage","Technologies":"Data encryption, privacy-preserving technologies, transparent data governance systems","People":"General public, workers in technology and data industries","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Transformation of cities through digital technology innovation changes","Impact":"Changes in economic activities, social interactions, and job landscapes","Mitigation":"Investment in digital infrastructure, upskilling of workforce, promotion of equitable access to technology","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, digital connectivity, e-learning platforms","People":"Urban residents, workers, and businesses","Owner":"City governments, private sector stakeholders"}]}
